column5: This beautiful and spacious town home is conveniently located just minutes from campus and is within a 3 mile radius of Kyle Field, George Bush Library, Northgate, and Texas Ave. Everything you need is a short drive away! This condo features:  - Fully equipped kitchen - Four bedrooms; space for 10 - Two full bathrooms and a half bath - A two-car garage and driveway (additional guest parking is available) - Covered back patio  - Community pool to relax at - Wi-fi internet and Sling TV
column8: Aggie Owned Townhome Minutes from Campus
